_header: Most clear of color and root of steadfastness
_description: The goodness of his mistress — one stanza rhyme royal

BLAdd5465.First Lines: Most clere of colour and rote of stedfastness␎
BLAdd5465.Note: With music in three voices credited to Robard Fayrfax.
